text: The very definition of 'beauty' is outside.
author: Adam Carolla

text: I always loved aesthetics. Not particularly fashion, but an idea of beauty.
author: Miuccia Prada

text: Now, I'm not saying I'm fashionable, but there are sociological interests that matter to me, things that are theoretical, political, intellectual and also concerned with vanity and beauty that we all think about but that I try to mix up and translate into fashion.
author: Miuccia Prada

text: What sort of sap doesn't know by now that picture-perfect beauty is all done with smoke and mirrors anyway?
author: Julie Burchill

text: Shame, like beauty, is often in the eye of the beholder.
author: Julie Burchill
